subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4282 has been delivered
description_text:

- Jacob

conversations.body_text: Hi Jacob Pradels, We will ship your items separately because their packaging cannot be combined. Additionally, the processing of your order has been affected by a delay in the latest restocking at our warehouse. We are expediting your shipment, and we kindly ask for a little more patience. Thank you very much for your understanding and support.

No problem, thank you for the update.

On Wed, Dec 3, 2025 at 11:09 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Jacob Pradels,    We apologise for any inconvenience caused. Here is another link for your parcel tracking.  https://www.fedex.com/wtrk/track/?trknbr=396216890960
